hedline.hl1: Suffolk Restricting Cell Phones in Cars

block.p: The Suffolk County Legislature voted to make it illegal to drive while talking on a hand-held cell phone. The law is based on the conviction that the phones are distracting and likely to precipitate accidents. Suffolk is believed to be the nation's first county to adopt such a law.
Emergency calls are exempted, and drivers may dial, as long as they do not drive while holding a phone.
